built_in_tools.name: codebase_search
built_in_tools.description: Semantic search tool for finding code snippets and documentation relevant to queries. Best for understanding existing code patterns and finding implementation examples.

built_in_tools.name: read_file
built_in_tools.description: Read file contents with line range support. Essential for understanding existing code structure and configuration files.

built_in_tools.name: edit_file
built_in_tools.description: Create new files or edit existing ones with precise line-by-line control. Primary tool for implementing code changes and creating new components.

built_in_tools.name: run_terminal_cmd
built_in_tools.description: Execute terminal commands for building, testing, installing packages, running scripts, and system operations. Critical for environment setup and validation.

built_in_tools.name: list_dir
built_in_tools.description: List directory contents to understand file structure and discover existing components before making changes.

built_in_tools.name: grep_search
built_in_tools.description: Fast regex-based text search across files. Useful for finding exact patterns, function names, and configuration values.

built_in_tools.name: file_search
built_in_tools.description: Fuzzy file path search to locate files when you know part of the name but not the exact location.

built_in_tools.name: web_search
built_in_tools.description: Search the web for up-to-date information about technologies, APIs, best practices, and current documentation.

mcp_tools.name: context7_resolve_library
mcp_tools.description: Resolve package names to Context7-compatible library IDs for accessing comprehensive documentation

mcp_tools.name: context7_get_docs
mcp_tools.description: Fetch up-to-date documentation for libraries using Context7-compatible IDs

user_resources.name: tanuki_architecture_doc
user_resources.description: Complete 521-line architecture document detailing the Tanuki-Programmer system with 127 specialized agents, training methodology, and implementation plan

user_resources.name: gcp_free_credits
user_resources.description: $300 GCP free trial credits available for cloud training infrastructure

user_resources.name: local_hardware
user_resources.description: 48GB RAM + 1TB external SSD for local dataset storage and development
